item.description:
The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148

Every Saturday Night is Ladies Night: (10 min from Boston).

This Saturday we have AMY T. and guest comedians. Amy T. has been identified as a rising star by the Boston Globe, and voted one of the Funniest Lesbians in America by CURVE Magazine - Amy Tee is one of the busiest comedians on the New England comedy scene….

Come and enjoy a night of dancing and a chance to meet some very nice women.

Great DJ that will be mixing their R&B, Latin and top 40 fabulous music all night long.

Any questions e-mail: Hideaway0101@yahoo.com or call 617 877 1808.

• ATM
• Hi-Def TV (Sports Channels)
• Premium Liquor
• (Food)
• 2 Parking Lots (FREE)
• $7.00 Cover charge
• Hours 8:00 p.m. to 1:30 a.m.
• 5 minute WALK from Malden T-Station
item.name: THE HIDE AWAY
